Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
Summary: I saw a jet chasing a object with fire coming out of it
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was december 14th 2012 when I saw a fighter jet chasing a UFO in New Orleans I was outside on my porch when I noticed a strange event going on a 7:58 am I pulled out my phone and started taking photos I think I may have some of the best photos of its kind I also have another photo I took december 21 at 11:58 pm so called dooms day I was on the same porch and the UFO hovered over me doing 5mph it was so low if I had a rock I could of hit it
trends: There have been 26 other sightings in New Orleans
There were no other sightings in New Orleans on or around December 14th 2012
